sentence: He was right in front along with Jim Jordan and all of the rest of them; they were fantastic.
title: Rick Scott says there’s no ‘war’ between Donald Trump, Ron DeSantis

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan hurried to agree that the death penalty was completely appropriate for this crime of … of … they’d figure that out later.
author: Mark Sumner
title: John Durham Flip Flops On Friday - Go Figure

sentence: Two of the senior House Republicans leading the drafting effort, Reps. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) and Cathy McMorris Rodgers (R-Wash.), previewed other potential planks this week.
title: Republican clash shows the enduring appeal, and dubious benefit, of campaign platforms

sentence: Rep. Lauren Boebert (R-Colo.) raged on Twitter: “Now that the New York Times has even confirmed the Hunter Biden laptop’s veracity, can we begin to admit that Joe Biden is, by definition, a compromised politician?” Meanwhile, Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) tweeted a link to a Post story on the Times’ confirmation, saying simply: “Told ya.” And the House Judiciary GOP linked the laptop scandal to claims by Democrats that former President Donald Trump colluded with Russia ahead of the 2016 presidential election.
author: Emily Crane
title: GOP fury at Big Tech, Dems after NYT admits Hunter Biden laptop is real
